Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of AI-Assisted Systematic Review in Evaluating NPWT Efficacy

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates the potential of artificial intelligence (AI) in performing systematic reviews compared to human investigators, focusing on negative-pressure wound therapy (NPWT), a widely used wound management technique with varied evidence.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the quality of evidence scores assigned by AI and humans.

Result_Outcome.evidence: AI generally assigned lower quality of evidence scores compared to humans.
